params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize BlipTextConfig.

params.name: vision_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize BlipVisionConfig.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and vision projection layers.

params.name: logit_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the logit_scale parameter. Default is used as per the original BLIP implementation.

params.name: image_text_hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the hidden state of the image-text fusion layer.

params.name: label_smoothing
params.description: A float in [0.0, 1.0]. Specifies the amount of smoothing when computing the loss, where 0.0 means no smoothing. The targetsbecome a mixture of the original ground truth and a uniform distribution as described inRethinking the Inception Architecture for Computer Vision <https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.00567>__. Default: :math:0.0.
